<ul>
  <li>NextJS v13</li>
  <li>SASS with Tailwind</li>
  <li>Typescript</li>
  <li>MongoDB Database</li>
  <li>Amazon S3 Storage for uploading images</li>
  <li>Date-fns</li>
  <li>Axios</li>
</ul>
